title: E284 The Troll Hole Em-porium and the Time Traveling Wedgie Patrol
description: Welcome to episode 284, where we have some dangerous banter wiggle room! This week, we're embarrassed we didn't know about Em's topic, the ginger biscuit-loving Tizzie Whizie. Then Christine brings us the second half of the tragic Oklahoma Girl Scout murders. And we'll leave you with this parting thought: if ghosts could time travel, would they watch us pick our wedgies? ...and that's why we drink!
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (em schulz, christine schiefer, Eva gross)
